DOC.detailed_description: Participants follow standard fertility protocol stimulate growth multiple egg follicle . When egg follicles mature , egg remove sedation , examine embryologist microscope mature egg immediately frozen keep frozen tank Penn Fertility Care use method label quality assurance currently place frozen embryo . Eggs thaw future participant wish attempt pregnancy fertilize standard method use In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) . Resulting embryo place uterus procedure require approximately 15-30 minute . The number embryo transfer dictated standard clinical practice . After embryo transfer , subject return serum pregnancy test 14 day embryo transfer . For pregnant , participation study . For achieve pregnancy , trans-vaginal ultrasound perform approximately 6 week gestation weekly thereafter 8 week gestation time , refer general obstetrician prenatal care . Participants ask provide study team information birthweight , height , length , gestational age delivery , complication delivery , infant number . This information routinely collect patient undergoing conventional IVF order maintain quality assurance recommend American Society Reproductive Medicine . Information also collect participant 's medical record include physical characteristic , medical fertility history , semen analysis partner appropriate , egg stimulation characteristic include medication , day stimulation , number egg follicle , number mature immature egg retrieve , number egg frozen , number egg thaw , number embryo , disposition embryo , pregnancy test result , number pregnancy survive first 12 week prenatal screening test .
